thread.title: SHRUTI CHAMADIA

author: SHRUTI CHAMADIA
title: SHRUTI CHAMADIA
text:
To be honest they had a price of 29.99 when I ordered my lenses and in 5 days they reduced the price to 15.99. Upon asking the price check and adjustments they say we cannot do it.
I also said can i return the old order and place the new one to which they replied that we wont reimburse the courier charges leading me lenses with twice the price
